channel.title: Android And Gaming on Drea Cole | Designed by Drea
channel.description: Recent content in Android And Gaming on Drea Cole | Designed by Drea

item.title: Boss Guacamole!
item.description: You need this sassy guacamole in your life. It’s spicy with a little attitude and has just the right amount of texture.

item.title: Decorating With Plants
item.description: I’ve never had much luck with house plants. They would always die on me (aka I would forget to water them) and I started to feel like faux was the only way to go.

item.title: DIY Bali-inspired Floating Brunch
item.description: Gorgeous social media photos of travelers enjoying a ‘floating brunch’ at a luxury resort in Bali or Thailand were on my mind as I looked outside at the newly completed pool in our backyard.

item.title: House Tour
item.description: House tour coming soon! Subscribe to get notified once it’s available.
